item.title: 编程参考手册
item.description: HTML CSS Javascript Ajax Promise Axios TypeScript Vue3 创建 Vue 项目 npm create vue@latest 根据需要构建项目 Vue.js - The Progressive JavaScript Framework ✔ Project name: … vue3_test ✔ Add TypeScript? … No / Yes ✔ Add JSX Support? … No / Yes ✔ Add Vue Router for Single Page Application development? … No / Yes ✔ Add Pinia for state management? … No / Yes ✔ Add Vitest for Unit Testing? … No / Yes ✔ Add an End-to-End Testing Solution?
